Articles.Content: Thanks for all the advice. I would take me forever to get to the big bombers though, my first bomber will be the Blenheim.
Out of curiosity, does the game have the B-52? I assume it would absolutely, positively annihilate everything.

Oi! Everyone gimme your steam usernames so I can contact you easier to make squads!

Out of curiosity, does the game have the B-52? I assume it would absolutely, positively annihilate everything.

*bitch slap* NO. WWII AND KOREAN AIRCRAFT ONLY!!! IF YOU WANT THAT CoD, STRATOSPHERE NUKING, MISSILE WHORING **** GO SOMEWHERE ELSE!!!!

*snarl*

Edited May 27, 2013 by chobit-389

I'm satcharna on Steam too.

If you're using a stuka (dive bomber) I'd recommend dropping your bombs from just a bit above the lowest point where you can safely pull up. If it's a dedicated bomber you're flying, go for at least 3.5km to avoid the flak.
Steam? Or Warthunder?

Oi! Everyone gimme your steam usernames so I can contact you easier to make squads!

*bitch slap* NO. WWII AND KOREAN AIRCRAFT ONLY!!! IF YOU WANT THAT CoD, STRATOSPHERE NUKING, MISSILE WHORING **** GO SOMEWHERE ELSE!!!!

*snarl*

Hey, I just messaged someone that I think is you in-game. OdinYggd is the IGN I am using.

Also apparently I am affected by the update bug that makes most of the maps unusable for IGP-powered users. Shame too, I was going to fly an American plane for a bit for comparison to the HE51C

Oi! Everyone gimme your steam usernames so I can contact you easier to make squads!

*bitch slap* NO. WWII AND KOREAN AIRCRAFT ONLY!!! IF YOU WANT THAT CoD, STRATOSPHERE NUKING, MISSILE WHORING **** GO SOMEWHERE ELSE!!!!

*snarl*

I thought it was a WW2 craft, seesh.

I thought it was a WW2 craft, seesh.

Are you thinking of the B-17 or the B-29 by any chance?

Also, my steam username is leon.galiano

I am very unimaginative when it comes to usernames

Are you thinking of the B-17 or the B-29 by any chance?

Yup, that's it. Are THEY in the game? Do THEY annihilate everything?
Manifesti, going to have the same avatar as on here.

Yup, that's it. Are THEY in the game? Do THEY annihilate everything?

Check the lists on the first page posted by chobit for the available aircraft.

Oi! Everyone gimme your steam usernames so I can contact you easier to make squads!

I use the same name everwhere. Rockcoole. I don't bother with more than one name.

My username is "Specialist290," just as it is everywhere I go. I direct-downloaded the client, though; I didn't get it through Steam.

EDIT: It's also hugely likely that I won't make it to all the squad ops, since my Internet connection wibblies make it hard for me to not get fed up with multiplayer games that require some sort of real-time coordination.

Edited May 27, 2013 by Specialist290
mine is RedWolf997 i think it got lost in thee first pages

Yup, that's it. Are THEY in the game? Do THEY annihilate everything?

There are a few variants of B-17 already and dish out just as much damage as they can take, a real bitch to try and sink one. The B-29 will eventually be added too
We need more MiGs first, though. There are far too few Soviet jets in the game right now.

I'm signing up now, will be The_Destroyer. I'll tell you if that changes.

EDIT: Whats this "get gold" button? I assume its premium currency, but can I earn gold, or do I need it.

Edited May 27, 2013 by The Destroyer

Alright I think I'm getting the hang of this. Just took out 4 AA emplacements in a single life.

Turns out as long as I load into Stalingrad I am okay, any other map and the game crashes. Known bug at the moment.

But I've got German and American both up to level 1 now, and my cashflow is starting to go up.

We need more MiGs first, though. There are far too few Soviet jets in the game right now.

The Soviets first did semi-jets to power their aircraft like the I-250 which were propeller aircraft with a rocket element. They were just prototypes but they could add them?

Also, it would be nice if I could see some of you ingame.

There's is plenty of russian jets already, plus the Russian techtree in general is very overpowered (there are two dev teams. One for Russian planes, one for everything else. a lot of the stats get lost in translation)

Here is a full list of current planned aircraft: http://warthunder.com/en/game/releasetree/

Or perhaps they could add this one?

It's a T60 with wings. Any and all arguments against it are hereby rendered inert.

Or perhaps they could add this one?

-snip-

It's a T60 with wings. Any and all arguments against it are hereby rendered inert.

Comrades...

Comrades.

Comrades, listen.

I have the most glorious

Comrades listen.

Comrades

We'll put WINGS

comrades

wings

We'll put wings

comrades, listen here

We'll put wings... on our TANKS!

There's is plenty of russian jets already, plus the Russian techtree in general is very overpowered (there are two dev teams. One for Russian planes, one for everything else. a lot of the stats get lost in translation)

Here is a full list of current planned aircraft: http://warthunder.com/en/game/releasetree/

Why a team for a single faction and another for the rest?

T60 with wings, what is the purpose? Some sort of delivery system? It would be better just to build a normal plane round the gun.

Well, it does seem like Soviet thinking.
